    How to update your SupplyChain365 licenses

    In the SupplyChain365 Portal, click on admin, then licenses.

    1. Here we see two different kinds of licenses: First. SupplyChain365 licenses, and second, external licenses. For example, the license for Microsoft Business Central users.
    2. SupplyChain365 provides licenses for the various modules: Warehouse, Transport & Delivery, Collaborate & Exchange, Third Party Logistics and Value Added Logistics and Scheduler.
    3. For example, we want to buy a warehouse server license and warehouse device licenses for 5 workers.
    4. Simply click on admin, then licenses and select warehouse.
    5. Here we see Warehouse & Logistics Extension and Server. We activate it for 25 to 49 users, which costs â‚¬500 per month.
    6. Below we see Warehouse & Logistics Device. Here we select 5 and click on the checkout button. Then click "I accept the general terms and licensing terms" and then the checkout button to complete the order.

    Note: This is a minimum price, actual prices can be higher based on size of your organization.

    This license will result in extra monthly costs based on usage of certain resources. See the license description.

    Now the order is being processed.

    Also, on the External Licenses page a user can buy licenses for essential users, team members, device users and premium users. Simply increase the counter, add to cart and checkout.
